description: Great work! It has even histogram for sensors, summary. All packed into UI.
I've been using this program for many years and always gives me a nice quick run-down of all my hardware.
Would say windows user's this is like ASTRA32 or one them..
I use Hardinfo to find the hardware in my system and keep track of changes. The program is easy to use and very useful
Very useful and easy to use
Great app, would reccommend
This is an awesome tool! The only thing I don't see is how to capture the actual "type" of devices like RAM. Other than that, it is a tool, I will use from now on! Thank you!
Recommend especially for the cpu load feature. Thank you to the developer/developers!
Very good tools
Shows every informartion needed
Very useful tool.
very useful app
its a must for network troubleshooting as well as monitoring live all temperature sensors. I wish it could show live temp on the top right corner of the OS
More useful than 'sysinfo' - just includes quite a bit more data - well organized - fun to just poke around and see what's (shallowly) under the hood
I love it because it quickly does what it's meant to do and doesn't break anything. I've used it with numerous distros with no problems.
the Program works fine and simple to use
A pity I didn't find Hardinfo before. Compact yet complete Hardware information.

lightweight and accurate.I love it.Keep develop
ment.
Works pretty well.
This app is very useful!

Quite complete application.
I've seen others that list the RAM sockets, and the characteristics of each RAM card. Is that really possible?
Fast and accurate it seems. One improvement could be (since I run on an iMac) to make the labels for applesmc/tempxx more informative.
This program works great and it tell me more than I need about my system.
summary: This app is great for benchmarking and checking your system

description:
This app has been solid ever since it was introduced. 
Hats-off to the legendary Dev Leandro Pereira(a humble guy) for all the contributions to Linux Community.
Неплохая програма, Информацию выводит локально, Без загрузки в сеть, Супер,
must have application

I marked it down one star only because some sections are difficult to see how the result compares to other results.
I.E. There is not really good Benchmark report - although the report of the device is neat.
nice features
All the info I need and more.
Amazing little tool for the geekz.
Nice summary of system information
It does what it should do. My only concern is, why is this software listed as proprietary in the snap store when it is clearly licensed under the GNU GPL v. 2?
Does what it says, does it well, enough said.
Really nice software!

Its pack with features, it really went above and beyond my expectations.
It shoud be included with the default distro installation..
One of my gpu fan is dead so I need to keep track of the temperature, this soft works really nice and has a lot of features.
I can =not download it
Clearly done by a pro
Device Manager from Windows, but on steroids
Excellent graphical way to show the hardware. Well worth a download.
It's useful, I like it.
Ressembles AIDA64 a lot
This works fine in Kubuntu 21.04, the system hardware was shown correctly except the Nvidia 1650 graphics card which wasn't detected.
summary: Useful software to view system specs

description: See hardware temp
fast and pretty accurate
It does what it is designed for
Very fast and neat program. I recommended this program
summary: Very fast and neat program. runs on Ubuntu 21.4

description:
Жаль, но не показывает мой nvme ssd диск... показывает только текущий GPU (не показывает дискретную графику)... Но все же, приложение очень прикольное, но очень старое, очень печально
Sad, but it not show my nvme ssd disk... show only current GPU (not show discrete) ... But application is good, but old, really sad
Gives detailed info about hardware
I have install this software on Debian 11 Bullseye and it made my life a lot easy batter than Device manager in windows Excellent Software
very nice. Must have
Connected in Ubuntu right away
brings lots of useful info to the surface
Great app must have
Just what I was looking for!
the best system monitoring
great app now i am using it this works very well.
easy to use it has CPU and GPU sensors

Read out info about the hardware. Read temperature sensors too.
Some benchmark is also there, to check that cpu is running good.
All working very good.
Does what it says
A lot of information, but will be great if had in the future disk usage, mb temp

It does what it says on the tin and then quite a bit more. 
Loads of info... nice!
Not working on Ubuntu 20.04 VM on Virualbox. Graphic of app is gibrish.
I will second way more then expected. Gives very detailed information on my system. Was exactly what I was looking for.
well it does it job (it's = it is) but I need it to see what my SSD was and well it doesn't appear well nothing appears
Hardinfo or Sytem Profiler and Benchmark as it is also know not working on Debian 12 bookworm KDE desktop. Installs fine but won't start up. Ran fine on KDE neon.
Fast and helpful. Shows system profile and allows for some benchmaking. I tested in many mainboards and some distros. Flawless in all of them.
Just installed and it is working fine.
Works like a charm for many years.
Excellent overall utiliy app. It gives a nice view into most HW and SW values and real-time sensors. Added to favorites.
summary: Works great with Ubuntu and NUK

description: ...but everything else works flawlessly on Ubuntu 22.04.3 Wayland.

Great app!
Ubuntu 22.04
Very nice interface, detailed information! Recommend!

Detailliert Angaben zum System
super alles erkannt

Unter Ubuntu 20.10 gibt es kein besseres System - Infotool *** alles wird angezeigt . Das Programm startet schnell und problemlos. Alle Tabellen sind übersichtlich und leicht verständlich.

summary: Sehr gut! Alles, was man braucht

description: Ist vollkommen intuitiv bedienbar und selbsterklärend. Dazu kann es einige Benchmark-Tests durchführen. Die Ergebnisse werden in Vergleichstabellen mit anderen CPUs angezeigt. Sehr benutzerfreundlich und übersichtlich gemacht!
Die elementarsten Dinge wie die BIOS Version und SÄMTLICHE Mainbordinformationen fehlen!
Sehr gut, richtige infos über Hardware und Treiber.

Dieses Tool liefert umfangreiche Geräte & System-Informationen. 

Diverse Benchmark-Programme sind ebenso integriert.
zeigt unter Ubuntu 22.04.2 LTS alle Daten korrekt an
tut was es soll und das perfekt
Buena información y rápida la aplicación
summary: Buena información y rápida la aplicación

description: Me parece una apli9cacion de buena calidad y sirve de mucho.

Excelente informacion, bien organizada, presentaciion clara y amistosoa.

Deberia ser parte del paquete Ubuntu que se instala desde un principio.
